mapper.select:
select m.materiel_id, m.materiel_num, m.materiel_name, m.category_id, m.specification, m.need_torque, m.out_torque, m.units_id, m.price, m.max_price, m.min_price, m.status, m.del_flag,m.create_time, m.create_by, m.update_time, m.update_by, m.remark, m.units_num,m.units_name, c.category_num,c.category_name,group_concat(mm.model_name) modelName from sys_materiel m left join sys_category c on c.category_id=m.category_id and c.category='0' left join sys_materiel_model mm on mm.m_id=m.materiel_id
m.materiel_num like concat(concat('%',#{mat.materielNum}),'%')
and m.materiel_name like concat(concat('%',#{mat.materielName}),'%')
and m.status=#{mat.status} and m.category_id=#{mat.categoryId} and m.units_id=#{mat.unitsId}
group by m.materiel_id order by m.create_time desc

select m.materiel_id, m.materiel_num, m.materiel_name, m.category_id, m.specification, m.need_torque, m.out_torque, m.units_id, m.price, m.max_price, m.min_price, m.status, m.remark, m.units_num,m.units_name, c.category_num,c.category_name,group_concat(mm.model_name) modelName from sys_materiel m left join sys_category c on c.category_id=m.category_id and c.category='0' left join sys_materiel_model mm on mm.m_id=m.materiel_id where m.materiel_id=#{materielId} group by m.materiel_id

select m.materiel_id, m.materiel_num, m.materiel_name, m.specification, m.need_torque, m.out_torque, m.price, m.units_id,m.units_num,m.units_name,c.category_id,c.category_num,c.category_name, mm.model_name, mm.pk_id from sys_materiel m left join sys_materiel_model mm on mm.m_id=m.materiel_id left join sys_category c on c.category_id=m.category_id and c.category='0'
m.del_flag='0' and m.status='0' and mm.model_name is not null m.materiel_num like concat(concat('%',#{mat.materielNum}),'%')
or m.materiel_name like concat(concat('%',#{mat.materielName}),'%')
and c.category_id=#{mat.categoryId}
order by m.create_time desc

select m.materiel_id, m.materiel_num, m.materiel_name, m.specification, m.need_torque, m.out_torque, m.price, c.category_id,c.category_num,c.category_name from sys_materiel m left join sys_category c on c.category_id=m.category_id and c.category='0' where m.del_flag='0' and m.status='0'

select m.materiel_id, m.materiel_num, m.materiel_name, m.specification, m.need_torque, m.out_torque, m.price, c.category_id,c.category_num,c.category_name from sys_materiel m left join sys_category c on c.category_id=m.category_id and c.category='0' where m.del_flag='0' and m.status='0' and m.materiel_id=#{id}
